attributes.action: change the law to ensure all employees enjoy the same privileges over tax free allowances and salaries which elected MPs enjoy, namely, they get to decide and vote on their own annual and other increases in salary and tax free allowances.  If this is NOT to be then the salary and tax free allowances should be decided by the people who pay them, the taxpayers, through the medium of annual referenda on the subject.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does anybody REALLY need an explanation of what is meant by this petition?
